channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- http-live-simulator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- http-live-simulator

item.title: CVE-2018-16479|2024-08-05T10:24:32.597Z -- hackerone -- http-live-simulator
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in http-live-simulator <1.0.7 causes unauthorized access to arbitrary files on disk by appending extra slashes after the URL.
